thread.title: Ipad And Iphone Touch Display Replacement Company
thread.title_full: Ipad And Iphone Touch Display Replacement Company

title: Ipad And Iphone Touch Display Replacement Company
text: Questions Business Summary A local and national iPad and iPhone repair company is available for purchase. The business has a local repair facility in Eastern Pennsylvania but also serves a national client base through a high traffic website. The business has contracts with local and national accounts including household brands, hospitals, school and school districts, major universities and software and other related companies. Product quality and high level customer service have separated this business from their competitors. Cell phone repair is a $1.1 Billion a year industry and growing. Industry experience is not required, owner will train. The business is primed to also be run on an absentee basis. Financials
